title: Gallic War 6.16 - Religion of the Gauls

content.question: Natio est omnium Gallorum admodum1 dedita religionibus, atque ob eam causam qui sunt adfecti gravioribus morbis quique in proeliis periculisque versantur aut pro victimis homines immolant aut se immolaturos vovent, administrisque ad ea sacrificia Druidibus utuntur. 1admodum, adv.: completely Bellum Gallicum 6.16 Translate the passage above as literally as possible.

frqParts.text: Natio est omnium Gallorum admodum1 dedita religionibus, atque ob eam causam qui sunt adfecti gravioribus morbis quique in proeliis periculisque versantur aut pro victimis homines immolant aut se immolaturos vovent, administrisque ad ea sacrificia Druidibus utuntur. 1admodum, adv.: completely Bellum Gallicum 6.16 Translate the passage above as literally as possible.
